author: breser
msg: Can't wrap the getversion.py call line, carriage return gets seen as
a argument of its own and makes getversion.py fail.
Unwrap the line that runs getversion.py and add a comment explaining why it

author: breser
msg: Small fix to avoid a no such file error during zip file source package
creation.  When the zip file source package is made python scripts have
CRLF line endings and shebang lines don't work properly.
Don't rely on the shebang line to invoke getversion.py, instead explicitly

author: nori
msg: Before a log for this revision, there is an additional log for r10418;
that first revision of ja.po was reviewed by Tez Kamihira
administrator, and its translations were improved in many respects
* subversion/po/ja.po: Work on many fuzzy/untranslated entries, review
and correct many translations, and make translations stay within 80
columns by running 'make locale-gnu-po-update'. Also add many
translated messages supplied by Clifford Caoile <piyokun@email.com>
and correct many translations thanks to comments from Kouhei Yanagita
Now ja.po has 890 translated messages and 16 untranslated messages at

author: mbk
msg: Make "svnadmin recover" more user-friendly by printing a warning
if the repository appears to be locked.
(subcommand_recover): Try to open the repository via the new
nonblocking interface before using the old one.
(get_repos): Change interface to no longer take an APR locktype, but
instead take two booleans, "exclusive" and "nonblocking".  Pass these
